H0.text: The Nobel Peace Prize winner for 2010 lives in which country. Norway

H1.text: The Nobel Peace Prize winner for 2010 lives in which country. United States

H2.text: The Nobel Peace Prize winner for 2010 lives in which country. India

H3.text: The Nobel Peace Prize winner for 2010 lives in which country. 中国

A4.text: Liu was the first Chinese citizen to be awarded a Nobel Prize while residing in China.

A5.text: During his fourth prison term, Liu was awarded the 2010 Nobel Peace Prize.
